item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. OpenAI calls on U.S. Government to let it freely use copyrighted material (21 points | 17 comments)

5. "Normal" engineers are the key to great teams (365 points | 340 comments)

7. The Church FAQ (128 points | 75 comments)
8. Y Combinator urges the White House to support Europe's Digital Markets Act (215 points | 111 comments)
9. Ex-Facebook director's new book paints brutal image of Mark Zuckerberg (158 points | 76 comments)
10. The 2008 coal ash disaster in Kingston, Tennessee (59 points | 22 comments)

27. Voker (YC S24) is hiring an LA-based full stack AI software engineer ( | hide)
28. Tiny changes in gene expression make big difference in eye size of fruit flies (40 points | 11 comments)
29. Functional Tests as a Tree of Continuations (2010) (55 points | 25 comments)
30. 'Profit-Enhancing Middlemen' Fuel $200B Health-Care Chaos (92 points | 57 comments)
